MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Job.Models.JobGetResponse WaitForJobCompletion (this Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Job.IJobOperations operations, string jobId, Nullable<TimeSpan> duration = null, Nullable<TimeSpan> waitInterval = null);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Job.Models.JobGetResponse WaitForJobCompletion(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Job.IJobOperations operations, string jobId, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.TimeSpan> duration, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.TimeSpan> waitInterval) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. The id of the job.
Optional. The maximum duration to wait for completion of job before returning to client. If not passed then wait till job is completed.
Optional. The interval to poll for job status. The default value is set from DefaultPollInterval property of HDInsight job management client.
Docs.summary: Wait for completion of a Job.
Docs.exception: Thrown when waiting for job completion exceeds the maximum duration specified by parameter duration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Job.Models.JobGetResponse> WaitForJobCompletionAsync (this Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Job.IJobOperations operations, string jobId, Nullable<TimeSpan> duration = null, Nullable<TimeSpan> waitInterval = null);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Job.Models.JobGetResponse> WaitForJobCompletionAsync(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Job.IJobOperations operations, string jobId, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.TimeSpan> duration, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.TimeSpan> waitInterval) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. The id of the job.
Optional. The maximum duration to wait for completion of job before returning to client. If not passed then wait till job is completed.
Optional. The interval to poll for job status. The default value is set from DefaultPollInterval property of HDInsight job management client.
Docs.summary: Wait for completion of a Job.
Docs.exception: Thrown when waiting for job completion exceeds the maximum duration specified by parameter duration.
